input.sentences: we started the night out at a local bar .
everyone was enjoying drinks and having fun .
we ventured outside and the streets were packed .
at nighttime the crowd began to disburse .
we went back to the local bar to end the night with another drink .
output.sentences: This man approached me at the bar, with a pink rose in his mouth.
My friends were watching me as this guy was offering me the rose, and I think they were filming it on snapchat.
The streets were crowded, and everything was a blur that night, since we were all a bit drunk.
I remember walking around outside under the streetlamps with tons of other people around me.
At some point in the night, I had posed with some stranger holding a glass of something in his hands.
